import React, { useContext, useEffect } from "react"; import useAuth from "../auth/useAuth"; import { CartContext } from "../layouts/Layout"; const CartPage = () => { const { cart, setCart, addedProduct, setAddedProduct, cartTotal, setCartTotal, } = useContext(CartContext); const { user } = useAuth(); useEffect(() => { console.log(user); }); return (

Checkout form

Below is an example form built entirely with Bootstrapâ€™s form controls. Each required form group has a validation state that can be triggered by attempting to submit the form without completing it.
